summary: This Add a Chimer Race to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
This mod a Chimer Race for Skyrim and its my first Race mod i keepd on trying to make one for a while but finaly got it  :D 

The Stats are like the Dunmers but Illusion is Restoriation instead

10 Destruction
5 Alteration
5 Restoration
5 Sneak
5 Light Armor
5 Alchemy

They also Have Custom Race Spells Same as the Dummer Race But adds Ancestral Bond instead with Shock damage and the resist stat is shock resist now

also there is a custom Bump map / eyes  of 5 colors but  left and right eye blindness choices also 

To be Vampire you have to  use console commands for now : / sorry about thats 

the Console command is -Player.Setrace Chimerracevampire

there is also some few choice betwen skins yellow to darker yellow and 1 orangish color + some extra hair color

Note to myself :  stop being picky on race mods i better accept the fact there is more of these mods like this simple recolor with custom eyes etc
author: Nilad
